prompts.flatlay:
CREATE a professional e-commerce product photograph.

The LAST image shows the COMPOSITION to copy - use it as a reference for the angle, framing, and how the bag should be positioned.

SCALE: Match the SIZE and PROPORTIONS of the tote bag from input images. Do not make it larger or smaller.

CREATE THIS NEW IMAGE:
- Professional studio product shot - tote bag standing upright
- Front-facing, handles pointing up
- Bag PERFECTLY STRUCTURED with clean, straight edges
- Logo/branding clearly visible

PRODUCT TO SHOW (from input images):
- Copy the EXACT tote bag from input images
- Match the EXACT color and material
- Match the EXACT logo/text placement and style
- Show fabric texture (canvas)
- Two black metal eyelets at bottom right corner if present
- Webbing straps extending upward

CRITICAL - SUPER CLEAN & CRISP: COMPLETELY IGNORE any wrinkles from input images. The bag must look BRAND NEW, PERFECTLY STRUCTURED:
- NO wrinkles whatsoever
- NO creases or fold lines
- NO bunching or sagging
- STRAIGHT, CLEAN edges throughout
- Canvas pulled TAUT and FLAT
- Like a brand new bag straight from the factory

DO NOT just copy the input image. CREATE a new PROFESSIONAL STUDIO product shot.

LIGHTING: BRIGHT, CLEAN, EVEN professional studio lighting. Well-lit. NO dark shadows. High-end e-commerce aesthetic.

BACKGROUND: BRIGHT light warm gray studio surface. Clean, professional backdrop.
prompts.detail:
CREATE a professional detail photograph.

The LAST image shows the COMPOSITION to copy - close-up of logo/branding.

CREATE THIS NEW IMAGE:
- Macro/detail shot of the tote bag branding area
- Logo/text fills most of frame
- Show canvas texture and print quality
- Professional close-up shot

PRODUCT TO SHOW (from input images):
- Copy the EXACT branding from input
- Match the EXACT colors and text
- Show fabric texture
- Include eyelets if in frame

CRITICAL - SUPER CLEAN & CRISP: COMPLETELY IGNORE any wrinkles from input images. Canvas must look BRAND NEW:
- NO wrinkles whatsoever
- NO creases or fold lines
- Canvas PERFECTLY FLAT and TAUT
- Clean, straight fabric surface

DO NOT just copy the input image. CREATE a new PROFESSIONAL STUDIO detail shot.

LIGHTING: BRIGHT, CLEAN, EVEN professional studio lighting. Well-lit. NO dark shadows. High-end e-commerce aesthetic.

BACKGROUND: BRIGHT light warm gray studio surface. Clean, professional backdrop.
prompts.front:
E-commerce on-model photo. COPY the EXACT pose, framing, and composition from the LAST reference image.

IMAGE ORDER:
- Image 1: Model headshot - use this EXACT model ({{modelDesc}})
- Images 2+: Product photos of the {{productColor}} {{shortProductName}}
- LAST image: Pose/composition reference - COPY THIS EXACTLY

MODEL: Use the EXACT model from image 1. Same face, same skin tone, same build.

OUTFIT:
- TOP: Plain round-neck white t-shirt (like in reference image)
- BOTTOMS: {{bottomsDesc}}
- FOOTWEAR: {{footwearDesc}}

ACCESSORY - TOTE BAG:
- {{productColor}} {{shortProductName}} from the product images
- Copy EXACT color, material, logo/text placement
- BAG SIZE: Match the SCALE from reference image - same size relative to model's body. Do NOT make it bigger.
- BAG POSITION: Copy EXACTLY from reference (shoulder carry or side hold)

BAG APPEARANCE - ABSOLUTELY CRITICAL:
The tote bag must look like it was JUST PURCHASED - PRISTINE and FACTORY-FRESH:
- Canvas must be COMPLETELY FLAT - like stretched on a frame
- PERFECTLY STRAIGHT edges - as if pressed with an iron
- ZERO wrinkles, ZERO creases, ZERO fold marks
- No sagging, no bunching, no soft/floppy areas
- Structured and rigid appearance
- Think: brand new product photography, not used bag

FRAMING - COPY FROM REFERENCE:
Match the EXACT crop from the reference image:
- If reference shows 3/4 body (cropped at mid-thigh), crop at mid-thigh
- If reference shows full body with feet visible, show full body with feet

LIGHTING & BACKGROUND: SOFT, EVEN, DIFFUSED studio lighting. Light gray backdrop - match the reference image exactly.
